Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: 石版
Entry.EnglishText: Stone Tablet

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: 焔の塔・八階
Entry.EnglishText: Burning Tower - 8F

Entry.JapaneseText: フェニアの聖殿・八階
Entry.EnglishText: Shrine of Fenia - 8F

Entry.JapaneseText: 焔の塔・八階
Entry.EnglishText: Burning Tower - 8F

Entry.JapaneseText: フェニアの聖殿・八階
Entry.EnglishText: Shrine of Fenia - 8F

Entry.JapaneseText: 光に触れれば善となり、 フォルスに触れれば悪となる。
Entry.Notes: https://youtu.be/JS3NlnWavKk?si=c17LNrfQpvYi3MPK&t=1148 If you hit the Birus with Force, you will aggro it (it's attracted to it). You must lead it to the shining pillar.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何かをあの光に触らせれば イイのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: Hmm, I see that shining pillar, but what should I do about it?

Entry.JapaneseText: 何かはわからないが、 フォルスに触らせては いけないらしいな。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not entirely sure, but this won't be solved by the use of Force.

Entry.JapaneseText: 光に触れれば善となり、 フォルスに触れれば悪となる。
あのバイラスを光に触れさせるのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: Am I supposed to make the Birus touch the light?

Entry.JapaneseText: 光に触れれば善となり、 フォルスに触れれば悪となる。
フォルスで操り、光に重ねよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Guide it with Force, and overlay the light.

Entry.JapaneseText: 光に重ねる？ 何を光に重ねるんだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: Overlay the light? But with what?

Entry.JapaneseText: フォルスで操り、光に重ねよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Guide it with Force, and overlay the light.

Entry.JapaneseText: フォルスでバイラスを操るのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe I gotta guide the Birus around with Force?
Entry.Notes: I'm personally not a fan of capitalizing nouns, even if they're important terms. feels LN-ish.

Entry.JapaneseText: フォルスで操り、光に重ねよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Guide it with Force, and overlay the light.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何も起きないや…… あの光に何を重ねれば いいのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: Nothing's happening... What am I supposed to overlay that light with?

Entry.JapaneseText: 何も起きないや……
Entry.EnglishText: Nothing's happening...

Entry.JapaneseText: 悪ってこーゆーコトなんだね……
Entry.EnglishText: I guess that's what it meant by 'malevolence'.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、ビックリした……
Entry.EnglishText: Gee, that spooked me.
Entry.Notes: not sure if this is said after aggroging and fighting the Birus

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
